author: Tyler Clifford
title: Jim Cramer says these two tech stocks will thrive 'when things get back to normal'
description: Apple and Facebook are "companies that are currently stinking up the joint, but should thrive when things get back to normal," the "Mad Money" host said.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer has spent recent weeks outlining publicly traded companies that are performing well, moderately well and poorly since the onset of the coronavirus outbreak.
On Wednesday, the "Mad Money" host revealed a new faction within the stock market: … [+3289 chars]
